data.message: Is shady serving manwich? Cuz it tastes like bologna, Man I'm beginnig to think vanilla ice is a more worth opponent,

replies.message: And you should f*** off b**** you don't even know him
Try to be his opponent you will be buried six feet below
And Anthony can even show his face you must be a f****** disgrace
Either that or you have a problem with someone's race
Who the f*** you trying to chase

I have a love/hate relationship with hip hop kyle. I grew up listening to NWA in like 5th grade. Dress like em', talk like em', etc. But as I have gotten older and gained more exprience I have gradually fallen away from hip-hop. #ProprietyOverStreetSlang - And we'll both ride home in my automobile.
But I do come out on occasion.

I only bring out the cheek bones for the promo, let me spell it out for you, otherwise you won't know, G. is for that gurdle you wear, don't miss the H., see how I just high hurdled you there, O. is for the ox-moron, where I learned S., the kama sutra I swore on, and ofcourse T. is for how much time I spent behind enemy lines.
Na, but seriously though Mr. Rowell, one cannot come into contact with liquid nitro and expect for the mood to stand still.
Did I just here somebody say, they wanna challenge me here? Pistol whipping bouncers 6' 2".
What you know about inspector gadget? You see my style and wish you had it, you wish for the end, but not willing to put in the practice,
